# GuidUtility.FromShortString method

Converts a short string to a GUID.

```csharp
public static Guid FromShortString(string shortString)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| shortString | The short string. |

## Return Value

The GUID.

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| FormatException | The argument is not a valid GUID short string. |
